meanings.definition: Located on the top of a car.
meanings.sent1: The cartop luggage carrier made our road trip more convenient.
meanings.sent2: The cartop tent provided extra sleeping space during our camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The cartop view of the city was breathtaking from the parking garage.
meanings.sent4: The cartop solar panels absorbed the sun's energy efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The cartop sign indicated the car was for sale.

meanings.definition: To place or attach something on the top of a car.
meanings.sent1: We need to cartop the bikes before heading to the trail.
meanings.sent2: He decided to cartop the kayak for their weekend adventure.
meanings.sent3: She carefully cartopped the surfboard to the roof rack.
meanings.sent4: The family will cartop the Christmas tree for the drive home.
meanings.sent5: They always cartop their luggage when traveling long distances.
